about_the_game:
One fine day, President Den realized that his time in office was running out, but there were still mountains of tasks left to do. Time to hit the road!

Each action is a small challenge. Help Den complete all of his tasks, without avoiding embarrassing and absurd situations, and leave a legacy as the president who failed almost every challenge...

Will Den manage to finish all the tasks and leave the country in chaos? It's all up to you!

How to Play:

Your task is to guide President Den through the level without letting him fall and while completing all the mission objectives. The character is controlled using the QWOP keys on a keyboard (or corresponding buttons on the screen in the mobile version):

  • Q — Jump

  • W (hold) — Move Forward

  • O/P — Balance the Character.

The goal of the game is to reach the end of the level without falling. Failure occurs if the character loses balance or does not complete the task.

Disclaimer: Warning – humor ahead! All characters and events in this game – even those based on real people – are entirely fictional. All voices are impersonated.

highlighted.name: Float Like a Butterfly, Sting Like a Bee

legal_notice: Disclaimer: Warning – humor ahead! All characters and events in this game – even those based on real people – are entirely fictional. All voices are impersonated.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0 or any 64-bit Linux distribution
  • Processor: AMD APU with 4 cores (Zen 2) or equivalent Intel processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated AMD RDNA 2 (on Steam Deck)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Steam Input support (for Steam Deck controller)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: AMD APU with 4 cores (Zen 2)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RDNA 2 (integrated on Steam Deck)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Full Steam Deck controller support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

movies.name: How to Beat the First Level - Presidential Tips and Tricks!

name: Bye!Den, GO!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Keyboard and mouse, gamepad recommended for better experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Keyboard and mouse, gamepad recommended for better experience

short_description: A satirical 2D platformer in the spirit of the classic physics-based puzzle game QWOP. Help President Den finish his tasks, getting caught in absurd situations and making decisions that lead the country to chaos. A unique blend of humor and absurdity awaits you in every mission!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
